statements: DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_id = 100 AND event_type = 'High';
DELETE FROM incident_details WHERE incident_id = 50 AND severity = 'Critical';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
